version_description: Fixed a walking dead baby glitch.

* Now the player cannot fall through the floor in the staircase towards the sewer.
* Objects does not get stuck in the player anymore.
* Fixed so Grandpa doesn't get stunned forever when he gets shot in his sleep.
* Grandpa does not become two Grandpas when he is stunned and then gets shot by the shotgun.
* Granny and Grandpa do not spawn on the same floor as the player after they get shot.
* Fixed so that the player can't climb on the chest of drawers.
* Changed the name (Granny The Next Chapter) to (Granny Chapter Two) in the main menu.

* Now more to explore.
* Added another Game Over scene.
* Granny and Grandpa are now babysitters.
* Added new items.
* Fixed some bugs and glitches.
Fixed a walking dead baby glitch.

* More places to explore in the house.
* A new way to escape from the house.
* A new weapon.
* New items to look for.
* A new Game Over scene.
* Fixed some bugs

* Added Nightmare mode
* Changed sewer texture
* A little brighter environment
* Fixed some minor bugs

*Fixed a problem with objects not spawn
*Player is moving a little bit faster

*Fixed a problem with the player head movement
*Fixed some bugs

* Fixed a problem with the planks on the front door
* Fixed an issue with Granny and Grandpa going straight through a door
* Added a little Christmas feeling
* Fixed some other bugs
